name: Speedo (Seppoday)
description:
Project not finished.

Play with mouse. (Game does not work on mobile)

Try to click on cars that go above 90 km/h. Don't click on cars that go below.

Unfortunately, I didn't manage to complete the (full) game in 3 hours. At the moment I am posting this version. If I manage to finish the game, an additional day system will be implemented (after each day it counts how much you have earned, etc.) and saving the highscore. Plus, better graphics and some sound. It's hard to make more in 3 hours :D
